title: If a guy dies, how many times does he die? - Quora

response.answer_text: He dies one physical death of his body. He dies a second death on judgement day when he comes before the Lord God the father his creator to give account of his life and why he did not accept the gift of eternal life through his son Jesus the Christ (the messiah).
Once..? Unless, he was only clinically dead for an amount of time and revived. In that case than at least twice.
